text: Now workers should have the right to join unions. But unions should not be forced upon workers. And unions should not have the power to take money our of their members' paychecks to buy the support of politicians that are favored by the union bosses.
author: Mitt Romney

text: Talk is by far the most accessible of pleasures. It costs nothing in money, it is all profit, it completes our education, founds and fosters our friendships, and can be enjoyed at any age and in almost any state of health.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

text: If a person gets his attitude toward money straight, it will help straighten out almost every other area in his life.
author: Billy Graham

text: I don't blame the players today for the money. I blame the owners. They started it. They wanna give it to 'em? More power to 'em.
author: Yogi Berra

text: It's morally wrong to allow a sucker to keep his money.
author: W. C. Fields
